summary: This document is an internal email chain among FBI personnel discussing media inquiries about Prince Andrew's cooperation with the Epstein investigation. It references a tweet from reporter Aaron Katersky about US Attorney Geoff Berman's statement that Prince Andrew had not responded to requests for an interview.

persons.name: Aaron Katersky
persons.context: His tweet is the subject of the email chain; he attended an event where US Attorney Geoff Berman made statements to the media.

persons.name: Geoff Berman
persons.context: Made a public statement that federal prosecutors and the FBI had asked to interview Prince Andrew about Jeffrey Epstein, but Andrew had not responded.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Publicly offered to cooperate with the Epstein investigation but, according to Berman, had not responded to requests for an interview from federal prosecutors and the FBI.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The investigation into his activities is the reason prosecutors and the FBI sought to interview Prince Andrew.

connections.description: Federal prosecutors and the FBI sought to interview Prince Andrew in connection with the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.
As US Attorney, Berman stated his office had requested an interview with Prince Andrew regarding the Epstein case.

events.title: Media Inquiry on Prince Andrew Cooperation
events.description: Internal FBI email chain discusses media inquiries following US Attorney Geoff Berman's public statement that Prince Andrew had not responded to requests for an interview about Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Berman's Media Availability
events.description: US Attorney Geoff Berman held a media availability where he stated federal prosecutors and the FBI had asked to interview Prince Andrew about Epstein, but Andrew had not responded.

keyFacts: On January 27, 2020, US Attorney Geoff Berman publicly stated that Prince Andrew had not responded to requests from federal prosecutors and the FBI for an interview regarding Jeffrey Epstein.
This statement prompted internal FBI discussions about how to handle media inquiries on the topic.
The document shows the FBI was anticipating and coordinating a response to media questions about Prince Andrew's lack of cooperation.
Prince Andrew had previously made a public offer to cooperate with the investigation, which is contradicted by Berman's statement.
